categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Darth Yun was a female Togruta Sith Lord who served the Sith Empire during the Third Galactic War. Yun was stationed on Corellia during the battle there but was slain in combat alongside Lord Feng.
Darth Yun wielded two yellow single-bladed lightsabers during combat and was also proficient in using Force Choke against her opponents.
Darth Yun is also referred to as "Darth Yuni" within the game files.
